skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Control your Airzone Aidoo device using your voice with the new Airzone Aidoo Skill.
Control the on / off, temperature and operation modes of your installation with your voice.

The Airzone Aidoo enables the control of all kinds of air conditioning systems from the main manufacturers in the sector.

Link your Airzone Aidoo account and detect your device to start using the Skill in the Alexa app, don’t forget to name the device to control it.

Control the on / off of the zone by asking Alexa to turn on or off the <name of the device>:
- Alexa, turn on the Kitchen.
- Alexa, turn off the Kitchen.

Change the operation mode by asking Alexa to set the <name of the device> to <operation mode>:
- Alexa, set the Living room to cool.
- Alexa, set the Living room heat.
- Alexa, set the Living room to auto (only for compatible systems).

Increase or decrease the temperature of your zone by asking Alexa to increase or decrease the <name of the device> by <number degrees; or to set the <name of the device> to <number> degrees:
- Alexa, increase the Bedroom by 2 degrees.
- Alexa, decrease the Bedroom by 2 degrees.
- Alexa, set the Bedroom to 72 degrees.
